sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Help out your teacher by running errands for them such as asking for a book from another classroom or returning the register to reception.

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
You'll need to record the errand/question/request onto a BIGMack talking switch.

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
